snippet.title: Iris.Fall - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Iris.Fall is a puzzle adventure game featuring striking visuals and a spellbinding theme of "light and shadow".

https://store.steampowered.com/app/907470/IrisFall/

The game will be released on Steam December 7, 2018.

About This Game
Solve clever puzzles and uncover an intriguing story full of mystery and wonder. With “light and shadow” as a core concept, Iris.Fall takes players on a monochrome adventure unlike any other.

Story Background:
After awakening from a dream, Iris follows a black cat into a dilapidated theater, traveling back and forth through a strange labyrinth of light and shadow. As the story unfolds, Iris begins to realize that everything in this theater seems to have some kind of hidden connection to herself.

Follow us on Twitter @ZdcInteractive
